name: Wazima Health
slogan: Transforming Access to and Delivery of Healthcare and Self-Care
description:
Wazima is eHealth for Sub-Saharan Africa and is a primary-care marketplace service which gives Africa access to telemedicine (qualified medical practitioners), self-care products, services & tools with which to better manage their health and medical conditions.

Only about 15% of the people who live in Africa can afford the very best health care or even to travel somewhere else in the world. Wazima eHealth is for the underserved 85% of the 1 billion Africans who pay out of pocket.

Our dynamic web platform offers:
*Self-care for those with chronic health conditions like diabetes, hypertension, asthma, cancer etc
* Pregnancy Support AI tools
* Fertility Support
* Health Insurance
* Strong international Clinician hub for collaboration.

We have launched in Nigeria and the United Kingdom

team.title: CEO of Wazima (formerly iDHSHealthWise)
team.name: Elizabeth Adeshina
team.bioHtml: Founder/CEO of Wazima, a Self-care and tele-health platform. Strong entrepreneurial track record in healthcare & pharma in the UK & Sub-Saharan Africa.

jobs.title: Chief Technical Officer
jobs.description:
Wazima Health is a startup on the lookout for a Chief Technical Officer to join our core team on an equity basis initially and a salary ONLY when we raise for our current round.

Are you passionate about healthcare and its delivery?
Are you able to commit to and improve our products?
Do you have a keen understanding of customers' unique pain points (can actively pinpoint problems) and articulate different solutions for them? 

Do you possess these qualities and skills:

**Impressive Technical Skills: Can work in multiple languages including C++, Java, and more.
**Advanced technological skill set and a demonstrated history with technology.
**Extensive industry knowledge with an eye towards the future.**
**Willing to Learn: Showcase an interest in continuing educational opportunities.
**Problem Solver: Solution finder to unexpected issues or bugs.
**Passionate: Find enjoyment in work.
**Setting a vision for how technology will be used in the company.
**Ensuring that the technological resources meet the company's short and long-term needs.
**Outline the goals for research and development.
**Creating timelines for the development and deployment of all technological services.
**Making executive decisions on behalf of the company's technological requirements.
**Acting as a mentor to team members.
**Maintaining a consumer-focused outlook and aiding in the delivering of IT projects to market.
**Managing technology budgets and time frames.
**Staying on top of technology trends and developments.
**Ensuring all technology practices adhere to regulatory standards.
**Exceptional team management skills.
**Excellent verbal and written communication.
**Ability to delegate efficiently.

If you answer yes to all of these and more, and would like to join us in making transformative change to healthcare delivery in the UK and the entire African continent, let's have a chat.

jobs.title: CSMO
jobs.description:
Wazima Health is on the lookout for a Chief Sales & Marketing Officer to join our core team based in London, UK but should also have strong knowledge of the Africa market and be willing to travel. This is an equity role initially plus salary when we are funded for our current round.

> Are you passionate about healthcare and its delivery?
> Have proven track record in sales and marketing?
> A natural sales person with a keen marketing skills and training?
> Able to turn our brilliant products into flowing profits?
> Understand marketing best practices and able to effectively promote our unique features?

Do you possess these qualities and skills:

**Ideally, previous C-Suite role (min B-level Manager with strong drive and skills).
**Strategic Thinker: Focused on the bigger picture.
**Creative: Think differently about the SaaS and iterate constantly.
**Analytical: Focused on facts and figures.
**Curious: Open-minded, want to understand the competitive landscape and consumer insights.
**Competitive: Strive for greatness.
**Resilient: Not afraid to fail.
**Good Communicator: Able to speak clearly and showcase the full value of our product or service.
**Charming: Create good first impressions and help customers feel valued.

If you answer yes to all of these and more, and would like to join us in making transformative change to healthcare delivery in the UK and the entire African continent, let's have a chat.
